liquidate-dto-contracts.title: Implement DTO Contract Liquidation
liquidate-dto-contracts.instruction_raw: Implement the fixes in BorrowerProfileDTO signature and Test Subscripting as defined in the SPEC. Run full finance unit tests to verify.

liquidate-loan-market.title: Implement LoanMarket Dict-Leak Fix
liquidate-loan-market.instruction_raw: Resolve the 'dict' object attribute error in loan_market.py by ensuring DTO objects are returned and used. Verify with loan market unit tests.

liquidate-regressions.title: Implement Behavioral Regression Fixes
liquidate-regressions.instruction_raw: Fix firm inventory slots and housing transaction protocols to resolve residual test failures. Maintain zero-sum integrity.

modernize-regression-tests.title: Implement General Test Logic Regressions
modernize-regression-tests.instruction_raw: Resolve judicial and manufacturing test regressions by aligning with current logic and SSoT.

modernize-omo-tests.title: Implement OMO & Settlement Test Modernization
modernize-omo-tests.instruction_raw: Refactor balance assertions in OMO and Settlement tests to use SettlementSystem SSoT. Ensure zero-sum integrity.

modernize-bailout-tests.title: Implement Bailout & DTO Contract Fixes
modernize-bailout-tests.instruction_raw: Fix BailoutCovenant and DTO signature collisions in tests. Ensure strict Dataclass usage.
